  • Refereed Papers

    Tamar Richner and Stéphane Ducasse, “Recovering High-Level Views of Object-Oriented Applications from Static and Dynamic Information,” Proceedings ICSM'99 (International Conference on Software Maintenance), Hongji Yang and Lee White (Eds.), IEEE, September 1999, pp. 13-22.

    Serge Demeyer, Stéphane Ducasse and Sander Tichelaar, “Why Unified is not Universal. UML Shortcomings for Coping with Round-trip Engineering,” Proceedings UML'99 (The Second International Conference on The Unified Modeling Language), Bernhard Rumpe (Ed.), LNCS 1723, Springer-Verlag, Kaiserslautern, Germany, October 1999.
